Game.Name: Disney Fairies- Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue
Game.Plot: Fly into Fairy Camp with Tinker Bell! It's the day after the Great Fairy Rescue and there is much to do to bring Summer to the Mainland! Create your very own fairy and fly into Fairy Camp. The Minister of Summer has a very special task for you -- to find and grow the rare Rainbow Lily for this year's End-of-Summer Celebration! Interact with Lily, then team up with your fairy friends to bring each of the six rare lilies to Fairy Camp. Complete quests, play mini-games and adventure through the Mainland to capture the Rainbow Lily before Summer is over! • Customize your fairy avatar - Select your fairy talent and customize our fairy's facial features, hair style, outfits, and accessories • Team up with your fairy friends in six action-adventures • Create new fairy outfits -- Select from over 260 clothing items and accessories • Compete in 30 mini-games -- Explore the mainland in various quests, time-based minigames, puzzles and crafts
